name: Fields of Mistria
desc: A fantasy farming / life sim RPG in development in Gamemaker Studio 2, inspired by genre classics Harvest Moon, Stardew Valley, and Rune Factory.

name: INFINITE GUITARS
desc: INFINITE GUITARS is a Turn-Based Rhythm RPG about Powering up Mechs with Guitar Solos and fighting in Anime Mech Battles, written in Unity!

name: YyBoss
desc: Gms2 project management tool, with a Json Api, commandline inputs, and native bindings.
